001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Threads;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.IterativeOptimizer;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
014
015import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
016import java.util.Map;
017
018public class OptimizationModelComplexity {
019
020    public static void main(String[] args) {
021        showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE, 10_000_000, 0.97f);
022    }
023
024    private static <N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int epochs, float learningRate) {
025        Plot weightPlot = new Plot("Average absolute weights");
026        weightPlot.display();
027
028        Plot weight2Plot = new Plot("Sum of absolute weights");
029//        weight2Plot.display();
030
031        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME " + " type=" + typeSupport.name());
032        mrePlot.display();
033
034        System.out.println("Type: " + typeSupport.name() + ", Learning rate: " + learningRate);
035        for (int m = 5; m <= 12; m = m + 2) {
036            showForNumberType(typeSupport, epochs, learningRate, m, mrePlot, weightPlot, weight2Plot);
037            Threads.sleepSilently(1_000);
038        }
039    }
040
041    private static <N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int epochs, float learningRate, int m, Plot mrePlot, Plot weightPlot, Plot weight2Plot) {
042        LinearRegression<N> regression = createClosedSolutionFitting(typeSupport);
043        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> optimizer = (VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N>) regression.getOptimizer();
044        optimizer.setLearningRate(learningRate);
045        optimizer.setEpochs(epochs);
046        optimizer.setEpochCompletionListener(IterativeOptimizer.sample(250, rmePlotter(mrePlot, weightPlot, weight2Plot, regression, learningRate)));
047        regression.fitComplexity(m);
048    }
049
050    private static synchronized <N extends Number> VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer.EpochCompletionListener<N> rmePlotter(Plot mrePlot, Plot weightPlot, Plot weight2Plot, LinearRegression<N> regression, float learningRate) {
051        return (epoch, model, trainSet, optimizer) -> {
052            Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regression.calculateRMEs(model);
053            mrePlot.addToSeries("Train RME (" + learningRate + ", " + model.getModelComplexity() + ")", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
054            for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
055                mrePlot.addToSeries(currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME (" + learningRate + ", " + model.getModelComplexity() + ")", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
056            }
057            mrePlot.redraw();
058
059            float totalWeights = 0.0f;
060            for (N parameter : model.getParameters()) {
061                totalWeights += model.getCurrentNumberType().absolute(parameter).floatValue() / model.getModelComplexity();
062            }
063            weightPlot.addToSeries("Model (" + learningRate + ", " + model.getModelComplexity() + ")", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{totalWeights});
064            weightPlot.redraw();
065
066//            totalWeights = 0.0f;
067//            for (N parameter : model.getParameters()) {
068//                totalWeights += model.getCurrentNumberType().absolute(parameter).floatValue();
069//            }
070//            weight2Plot.addToSeries("Model (" + learningRate + ", " + model.getModelComplexity() + ")", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{totalWeights});
071//            weight2Plot.redraw();
072        };
073    }
074
075    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createClosedSolutionFitting(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
076        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
077        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
078        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator);
079    }
080
081    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
082        dataSetGenerator.setRandomSeed(165);
083        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.5f);
084        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
085        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
086        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
087        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
088        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, new VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<>(basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType()));
089    }
090
091}
